name: SpellCasters (ColaIsCat)
description:
Welcome to the magical world of Spellcasters! Experience physical therapy like never before. Perform exercises in form of magical spells. Trace magical spells and get instant feedback in VR. Decorate your own garden or interact with the animals. You can also create your own customized scalable spells too.

Play using Oculus Rift, Quest with Link, or HTC Vive.

We are excited to have you try Spellcasters. Any questions contact Rutul Thakkar (email:  rmthakka@ucsc.edu) to share feedback / report bugs.
